channel.title: Castlewars.. (NOT the code too large thing)
channel.description:
So I got the code too large thing, searched, and I made a second parseincomingpackets(). Now I paste the castlewars there and I get an error: [code]client.Java:13629: ';' expected if (objectID == 4484) // Show scoreboard in lobby ^ 1 error Press any key to continue...[/code]
Here's the code above and below it...
[code]public void parseIncomingPackets1() if (objectID == 4484) // Show scoreboard in lobby { castleWarsScore(); //Shows the scoreboard[/code]
Any help?

@Wolfeyes217 wrote:

No you just gota go to the part where you client the scorboard and add a ; after the showboard thing…
